column2: "〔Why〕〔Not other clans〕〔She focuses only on me〕〔No matter how far I run〕〔She does not give up〕"
"〔You〕〔Tell her to stop〕〔Take responsibility〕〔For your own〕"
"Ah! There you are! Why do you keep running away as soon as you see me?"
"<%me>, what's up? Looks like you were communicating with that Ko clan member."
"Something to tell me? It can wait. I need to catch up with him before he gets away again."
"The reason I focus on him? Isn't it obvious? Because he's in danger."
"I don't have time to explain, he's getting away. Later!"
